SCIE-123-01: Evo Devo Module

About Class

This class is about my favorite field of biology - evolutionary development, often nicknamed Evo Devo.

About Me

My name is Ciera Martinez. My PhD work was on the evolution of plant shape, but I have also been part of teams that have published evo-devo work exploring the evolution of wood, flowers, roots, and stems. I am now a Post-doctoral Fellow at UC Berkeley studying the evolution and patterning of Drosophila embryogenesis.
